titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of Dr. Norman Shumway and expressing the condolences of the Senate on his passing.
A resolution honoring the life of Dr. Norman Shumway and expressing the condolences of the Senate on his passing.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Mourns the loss of Dr. Norman Shumway and recognizes his contribution to medical science and discovery (performed the first successful heart transplant in the United States).
